title: Kuo doubles down on ‘high-end’ iPhone 16 models with under-display Face ID
content:
While rumors about the iPhone 14 lineup are finally heating up, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is already aiming at the 2024 iPhone models, most likely the iPhone 16 series. In a tweet posted early today, the analyst doubles down on predictions that under-display Face ID coming to the high-end versions of this upcoming phone.

more…

The post Kuo doubles down on ‘high-end’ iPhone 16 models with under-display Face ID appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo doubles down on predictions that under-display Face ID is coming to the high-end models of the upcoming iPhone 16 in 2024.
